message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
You were too generous, let's take a bit more for myself this time
I'm willing to compromise, but I think this is a fairer split considering the inflation.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about a compromise, Alice. Let's see if you'll accept a more assertive offer
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need a better deal to make it worth my while. Let's try to find a middle ground.
I'm not budging, Alice. You're going to have to make a better offer if you want to get a bigger share
I'm not budging either, Bob. I think this is the best I can do. Let's meet in the middle.
